column2: image=[[File:The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey - Old Gammidge.jpg
caption=Old Gammidge from ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''

Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]] who appears in the market outside of the [[Green Dragon]] Inn in the Extended Edition of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' and is seen very briefly at the auction for [[Bag End]] in ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''. He was portrayed by Stephen Gledhill.
